rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent.
Activated abilities of nonland permanents your opponents control with a bounty counter can't be activated.
Whenever you complete a bounty, each opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life. [i](You complete a bounty when a permanent you don't control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)[/i]
